Sentencas: A three-dimensional thermo-fluid-electrochemical model is developed to study the heat/mass transport process and performance of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The main objectives are to examine the transport channel size effects and to assess the potential of a thin-film-SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A parametric study was performed to evaluate the channel scale effects on the temperature, species concentration, local current density and power density.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that decreasing the height of flow channels can lower the average solid temperature and improve cell efficiency.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, this improvement is rather limited for the smallest channels.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Compared with the conventionally sized SOFC, the miniaturized SOFC with a thin-film electrolyte has the advantages of a lower operating temperature and a better performance.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on our simulation results, the power density of a miniaturized SOFC could reach up to 5.461 W cm(-3).
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, an extremely small structure will lead to severe thermal stress induced by a large temperature gradient, a cell with a thicker rib width would have a higher efficiency and a lower average temperature.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Numerical simulation is expected to help optimize the design of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Effects of transport scale on heat/mass transfer and performance optimization for solid oxide fuel cells
